- Repeat 3–5 times

- In tense moments, your brain often reacts before your mind thinks.

  > *"I need a moment. I’m going to take a breath — and then I’ll respond."*  

> 💬 This gives you space — and prevents impulsive reactions.

- Instead of reacting to emotions, ask:

  > *"What do I need right now?"*  
  > *"Is this about me — or is it about something else?"*
